comments:
Build ID: M20060921-0945

Steps To Reproduce:
Running OpenSUSE 10.1 with the following environment:

# java -version
java version "1.5.0_07"
Java(TM) 2 Runtime Environment, Standard Edition (build 1.5.0_07-b03)
Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (build 1.5.0_07-b03, mixed mode, sharing)

Eclipse SDK

Version: 3.2.1
Build id: M20060921-0945

# rpm -q gtk2
gtk2-2.8.10-39.13
# rpm -q kdebase3
kdebase3-3.5.5-113.1
# rpm -q qt3
qt3-3.3.7-9.4

It appears attempting to right-click on the package explorer is generating an Exception and the menu is never shown.  I am attempting to right-click on projects, files to obtain different editors, etc.  It doesn't seem to matter what I try to right-click on either in the default Java perspective or others.

More information:
Here is the complete .log for the workspace:

Just wanted to get this into the bug database for others to be able to search.  It relates to doing a manual installation of MyEclipse on Linux and is documented in their forum:

http://myeclipseide.com/index.php?name=PNphpBB2&file=viewtopic&p=69379
Closing as part of mass query to clean up old resolved bugs in untargetted milestones.
